name: PetalPurple
0:
”Alexa ask petal purple tvs school today percentage”
”Alexa petal purple may i know percentage of tvs school today”
”Alexa could you say percentage of mahathma school today”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: petal purple
des:
This skill helps to the petal purple user to know their school information daily. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link PetalPurple skill in your app. Usershould go either website or mobile application to get the details of school, but by using this alexa skill user can easily get the information using voice. We provided the first version of skill which includes the attendance detail of scho
User can easily know their needed information while asking the below example phrases.

"Alexa,may i know percentage of mahathma school today."
"Alexa, what is the percentage of tvs school today."

If you have any questions, please visit the PetalPurple FAQ at PetalPurple Link to Your US FAQ
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
